history.message:
Hi Sean,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Sean,

Good to hear from you again. Are those four in sequence? Asking because I... like them all. We can do one with all four, or four different articles (the latter is my preference).

Thank you, yours,


D.

All right. I'll continue this by email (as registered on Submittable) with what I have in mind. 

I'm a bit obsessive for Moby Dick (you know how it is, I suppose), just to say, but you somehow hit all the ducks in the row with the rest of them... Oof, synchronicity etc.


D.

D:


Nope--no sequence; the four are standalone pieces! I'm delighted that they resonated. I really appreciate your giving my work a look! Let me know if I can give any more info, etc.

Best,

Sean

Ah, we Moby Dick freaks are an exceedingly small but quite passionate (and awesome) crew. SO glad this poem found the right home, and I'm absolutely thrilled that the others also spoke to you. Thanks--this is fantastic and greatly appreciated!

Sean
